name: Dice Manager
description:
Dice Manager is a dice management simulator where you recruit dice, assemble a team, and pit that team against increasingly difficult opponents. However, your dice get worn down from the action and eventually need to rest up.

Each time a die lands on a result, the wear causes that result to become more likely in subsequent rolls.

Dice can be sent to training, where they receive less wear but don't risk losing you a wager.

Dice can also rest, which removes some of the wear.

If a die is completely worn down, it shatters and is lost forever.

If your money goes below 0 credits, that's game over.

How long can you last in this endless game?

Controls:
Click and drag dice between the four areas (Shop, Fight, Train, Rest).
Click the Next Day button to advance and see the result of the fight.

Made during GMTK Game Jam 2022 (theme: "roll of the dice").
